_meanings:
{1} {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> ({#Barati-te; biBarti, biBfte#},
{#baBAra baBre, biBarAMcakAra-cakre, aBArzIMt-aBfta#},
{#Barizyati-te, BartuM, Bfta#}; {%<ab>pass.</ab>%} {#Briyate#}; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%}
{#biBarizati-te#} or {#buBUrzati-te#})

{@--9@} To keep, hold,
retain (as in memory).

{@--13@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To acquire, gain.
({#garBaM Bf#} to become pregnant, conceive;
{#kzitiM Bf#} to rule the earth; {#jawAM Bf#} to
wear matted hair &c.).
